author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the code to use the g/setVariable() methods rather than g/setScopedVariable(). Right now the g/setScopedVariable() methods are exactly the same as their g/setVariable() methods so I removed them from Jelly as a bit of spring cleaning.
If in doubt there's always findVariable().

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched so that this file works on Windows. We may want to define some global variable like ${maven.script.ext} to be '.bat' on Windows or '' otherwise to make this kinda thing easier.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o use the latest werkz snapshot
